Share: Digg Facebook StumbleUpon SARS Cases Continue to Increase © 2003 by Linda Moulton Howe SARS Cases as of April 9, 2003 Reported by CDC and W.H.O. United States Suspected SARS pneumonia cases in the United States have climbed to 154 in 30 states; no deaths.
